thread.title: NFL's Bengals tentatively settle cheerleaders' suit in Ohio
thread.title_full: NFL's Bengals tentatively settle cheerleaders' suit in Ohio

title: NFL's Bengals tentatively settle cheerleaders' suit in Ohio
text: > Sports NFL's Bengals tentatively settle cheerleaders' suit in Ohio FILE - In this Saturday, Aug. 29, 2015, file photo the Cincinnati Bengals cheerleaders take the field in the first half of an NFL preseason football game against the Chicago Bears in Cincinnati. The Cincinnati Bengals have reached tentative settlement of a federal lawsuit over pay for their cheerleaders. Documents filed in U.S. district court show the Bengals agreed to pay Ben-Gal cheerleaders a total $255,000 to settle claims that their time commitments for games, practices and promotional events netted them payment that was below minimum wage. (AP Photo/Gary Landers, File)
